channel.title: Chat logs wont show in cmd?
channel.description:
I can see when people do commands on the server like ::pickup 0995 100000 but no chat logs. How can I make it show what people say in the cmd too?
PS : idk if this makes a difference but the source is a 474

item.title: Chat logs wont show in cmd?
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:8, topic:312522”]search this.

println[/quote]and look for?

Read full topic

item.title: Chat logs wont show in cmd?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.source: Chat logs wont show in cmd?

item.title: Chat logs wont show in cmd?
item.dc:creator: @coalman58 coalman58
item.description:
@coalman58 wrote:

[quote=“Scape-JAVA, post:6, topic:312522”][quote author=coalman58 link=topic=408921.msg3018430#msg3018430 date=1257389632]

I don’t think you can get the chat messages to appear in the cmd.
However, there is a chat log file in the server folder which should do fine.

Find your method that sends the chat to client and add this:

System.out.println(CHATTEXTVARIABLEGOESHERE);

I don’t use 474 but replace the CHATTEXTVARIABLEGOESHERE with the chat text variable.
[/quote]that helps but im not the greatest at finding something that i dont have any idea where it would be and once i found it idk the CHAT TEXT VARIABLE

revres.java

it’s backwards find out what it’s called, and i’ll help.[/quote]its server.java and i got it open now what?

Read full topic
